name: weekly-review
prompt: Weekly performance review. Run: 1) `botcore get_tuning_dashboard` 2) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` 3) `botcore get_adjustment_history`. Create a detailed report (under 2000 chars) with: weekly PnL, win rate, strategy breakdown, tuning changes, recommendations. Then send it to Telegram by running `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the report.
